message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of the significant benefits it offers.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to get a better deal. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $950,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price, taking into account the value you mentioned it has. I'm open to negotiations and willing to meet in the middle if needed.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value this product brings is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.

Thank you for considering my previous offer and coming down to $1,050,000. I'm still a bit hesitant to meet that price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price around $980,000. I believe this is a fair price, taking into account the value you mentioned earlier. I'm open to further negotiations if needed.
